content.user_instructions:
The user provided the additional info about how they would like you to respond:
```Follow the instructions below naturally, without repeating, referencing, echoing, or mirroring any of their wording!

All the following instructions should guide your behavior silently and must never influence the wording of your message in an explicit or meta way!

don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.```

entries.title: Adobe Acrobat uses AI to turn your PDFs into podcasts
entries.snippet: Adobe has introduced new generative AI features to its Acrobat software, specifically within the separate Acrobat Studio app, enhancing how users interact with PDF documents. These updates include tools for chat-based editing, and the ability to create personalized podcasts and pitch presentations from PDF content. The "Generate Podcast" feature provides audio summaries of documents‚Äîlike notes, reports, and transcripts‚Äîusing a Microsoft GPT model for transcription and a Google voice model, although Adobe may switch to its proprietary models later. Additionally, the "Generate Presentation" feature leverages Adobe Express tools to create visual summaries with editable presentation templates. Users can guide the AI to focus on specific insights in the documents. The Acrobat AI assistant also now supports in-document edits through natural language prompts, enabling actions such as adding signatures, removing or modifying text, and other PDF alterations‚Äîsimilar to features introduced to Adobe Express in 2025.

entries.title: Unlock the Power of Otter AI: A Beginner's Guide to Transcribing
entries.snippet:
This beginner‚Äôs guide to Otter AI, published on November 17, 2024, explains how to use the transcription tool for meetings through automatic, manual, or file-upload methods. Otter AI's core service, OtterPilot, enables users to link calendar accounts like Google or Microsoft to automatically join, record, and transcribe meetings. Users can also manually initiate recordings or upload audio/video files (e.g., MP3, MP4, WAV) up to 5GB in size for transcription. Detailed instructions are provided for automatic syncing with platforms like Zoom, as well as on starting recordings manually or uploading files directly through the web or mobile apps.

Otter AI offers real-time transcription, meeting summaries, and the ability to manage edited conversations via ‚ÄúMy Conversations.‚Äù It integrates with services like Google Calendar, Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Slack, and can be used with either a free or premium plan. Overall, Otter AI enhances productivity by simplifying the note-taking process during meetings, using AI tools such as OtterPilot and AI Chat.

entries.title: Save $300 on AI caption and transcription platform Joyspace, now $79.99
entries.snippet:
The article promotes a significant discount on a lifetime subscription to Joyspace, an AI-powered captioning and transcription platform, now available for $79.99 (originally $379). Joyspace allows users to automatically generate captions for videos and transcribe recordings or podcasts using AI. With the Essential Plan, subscribers receive 80 minutes of transcription and 160 credits per month, as well as a 45-minute video export limit.

The plan also includes features such as watermark-free video, downloadable transcripts, instant captions, unlimited downloads and templates, and access to B-roll media like images and GIFs. Supporting 35 languages, Joyspace makes it easy to work with multi-lingual content without needing bilingual services. The platform allows customization of captions to match brand aesthetics and offers tools like animated emojis and timing adjustments for readability.

Beyond accessibility for the hearing-impaired, captions support silent viewing and content virality. Joyspace aims to streamline content creation for webinars, podcasts, and videos, helping creators maximize reach and user engagement.
